de.codecrafters.tableview

Class TableDataAdapter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
      • de.codecrafters.tableview.TableDataAdapter<T>
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    SimpleTableDataAdapter

    public abstract class TableDataAdapter<T>
extends
    The abstract implementation of an adapter used to bring data to a TableView.
    Author:
    ISchwarz

      • getCellView

        public abstract View getCellView(int rowIndex,
               int columnIndex,
               ViewGroup parentView)
        Method that gives the cell views for the different table cells.
        Parameters:
        rowIndex - The index of the row to return the table cell view.
        columnIndex - The index of the column to return the table cell view.
        parentView - The view to which the returned view will be added.
        Returns:
        The created header view for the given column.
